description: This file defines the MessagesPage widget, a Flutter UI component that displays a list of conversation IDs and enables navigation to a chat page. It uses provider for state management to fetch message data.

classes.name: MessagesPage
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of conversation IDs or a message prompting to start a conversation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the MessagesPage, showing either a list of conversations or a prompt to start a chat.
